document_data.mainbody:
The Stoneeaters ring was a curiously-named enchanted piece of jewelry.
The wearer of the Stoneeaters ring could cast the stone to flesh spell once per day.
The sages who discussed the Stoneeaters ring admitted that the item had history or note, however, they refused to elaborate for one reason or another, claiming that it was "irrelevant and distracting."
As of the , the ring was available for sale at the Grange, a pacifist trader who refused to sell armor and weapons in the city of Elmwood, Moonsea region.
